typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{PC_Y0_14,AD} as string,
		{14.6 } as string,
		{14.5 2} as string,
		{14.5 3} as string,
		{15.5 4} as string,
		{15.5 5} as string,
		{15.5 6} as string,
		{ 7} as string,
		{ 8} as string,
		{ 9} as string,
		{ 10} as string,
		{ 11} as string,
		{13.9 } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> source1
source1 split(contains(array(columns()),isNull(#item)),
	disjoint: true) ~> LookForNULLs@(hasNULLs, noNULLs)
